thread.title: DeMarcus Cousins’ manager sums up the Kings-Pelicans trade with a perfect tweet | For The Win
thread.title_full: DeMarcus Cousins’ manager sums up the Kings-Pelicans trade with a perfect tweet | For The Win

author: Adi Joseph
title: DeMarcus Cousins’ manager sums up the Kings-Pelicans trade with a perfect tweet | For The Win
text:
By: Adi Joseph | February 20, 2017 1:10 am Follow @AdiJoseph 
DeMarcus Cousins only played two minutes Sunday in the 2017 NBA All-Star Game. Guy barely breaks a sweat, conducts a few interviews, gets changed and … flies back home to Sacramento? 
Cousins probably had already left Smoothie King Center when he found out for sure that it would be his new NBA home. This photo from his manager, Andrew Rogers sums it up perfectly: We don't even know where to go… pic.twitter.com/NV1ySfJvun 
— Andrew Rogers (@Andrew_Rogers_) February 20, 2017 
You may have heard Rogers’ name before, by the way. He’s the guy who slapped Jason Terry . 
The Pelicans, for their part, also dropped a pretty perfect tweet. 
— New Orleans Pelicans (@PelicansNBA) February 20, 2017 
This trade was something else. More DeMarcus Cousins!
